```{asis, echo = {{baseline_model_knit}}, eval = {{baseline_model_knit}}, include = {{baseline_model_knit}}}
### Fit the baseline risk model
```

```{r, echo = {{baseline_model_knit}}, include = {{baseline_model_knit}}}
baseline_model <- baseline_model(main_connected_data, treatment_df, outcome, outcome_measure, 
  reference_treatment_all, model_type, {{baseline_model_regressor}}, seed)

baseline_model$dic |> 
  gt::gt(rownames_to_stub = TRUE) |>
  gt::tab_header(title = "Model fit for all studies") |>
  gt::tab_options(column_labels.hidden = TRUE) |>
  gt::fmt_number(rows = c(1:3), decimals = 3) |>
  gt::fmt_number(rows = 4, decimals = 0)
```
